featured.text: All passengers riding in cars are required to fasten their seatbelts in order to reduce the risk of _____ in case of an accident.
By 1955, he had completed an improved version of the product, with each square inch of material containing 300 hooks, which made it stay fastened and yet easy enough to pull apart when needed.

definition.zh_def: 使固定或牢固，通常是用扣子、帶子或其他裝置。
definition.en_def: To attach or secure something firmly in place.
definition.example: Please fasten your seatbelt before the flight.
